revision.comment: Added screen category to the article.
revision.text:
{{ZScriptNote}} __NOTOC__
'''[[Structs:Screen|Screen]]'''
native static Color '''PaletteColor'''(int index)
== Usage == Used to get a palette color as an RGB value.
=== Parameters === *''index'' - The index of the palette color that should be retrieved
=== Return value === Returns the palette color as a Color object.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]] [[Category:Screen]]
